name: PDF Reader
description: MCP server for reading and analyzing PDF files - enables AI assistants to work with PDFs
author: Muhammad Saqib Aziz

tools.name: read_pdf_pages
tools.description: Read specific pages from a PDF file

tools.name: read_pdf_page_range
tools.description: Read a range of pages from a PDF file

tools.name: search_pdf
tools.description: Search for terms in a PDF file

tools.name: get_pdf_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata from a PDF file
